import React from 'react'; const AboutSection = () => { const skills = [ { category: 'Design', items: ['UI/UX Design', 'Prototyping', 'Figma', 'Adobe Creative Suite', 'Design Systems'] }, { category: 'Development', items: ['React', 'JavaScript', 'HTML/CSS', 'Node.js', 'Git'] }, { category: 'Tools', items: ['VS Code', 'Chrome DevTools', 'Postman', 'Sketch', 'Principle'] } ]; return (

About Me

I'm a passionate designer and developer with over 3 years of experience creating digital products that users love. My journey began with a fascination for how things work and look, which led me to explore both the creative and technical sides of product development.

I believe in the power of good design to solve real problems and create meaningful connections between users and technology. When I'm not designing or coding, you can find me exploring new design trends, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the community.

50+ Projects Completed
3+ Years Experience
100% Client Satisfaction

Skills & Expertise

{skills.map((skill, index) => (

{skill.category}

{skill.items.map((item, itemIndex) => ( {item} ))}
))}
); }; export default AboutSection;
